title: Is everyone who hates being ignored a narcissist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Um no because most logical people hate being openly ignored. Especially if its clear when someone is doing it. The difference between a narcissist silent treatment and being ignored, is the narcissist is ignoring you to address another form of supply and begin a smear campaign/attack. But they'll always come back and pretend nothing happened or your going crazy which adds onto the devalue and gaslighting. Also a way so the narcissist has attention and admiration is by gaslighting your emotions long enough to cause harm and feed them attention and admiration at the cost of your own wellbeing.

No, not at all. Some personality types just hates attention… and other personality types just hates to be ignored… and other personality types could not care less… So, which personality type are you? It will be fun - study your personality type of hand of your date of birth so as to get to know yourself better and get so many more answers…
